author: rhuijben
msg: Optimize the which_trees exists query a bit by not using a union when
we can just use intermediate results in most use cases. This avoids creating
(STMT_DETERMINE_TREE_EXISTS): ... this and just return all op_depths.
(which_trees_exist): Add any_exists output argument. Allow passing NULL for
all output arguments. Stop getting more rows when the results are filled in.

author: esjewett
msg: [ESME-328] New updates will now show up on the timeline - also got rid of the postPostCallback function as these behaviors will now be dealt with within the CometActor message handling for each timeline.

author: bimargulies
msg: Improve site plugin config to push sites with versions in their pathnames.
